name: Mothership (Almax)
description:
MOTHERSHIP

Try to reach the end of your journey before you run out of power
Mothership consumes power to move
When the mothership takes damage you lose power
Killing enemy ships gains power

Spawning fleets costs power
Light fleet = 50
Medium fleet = 120

CONTROLS

Left click - select units (friendly/green only)
Right click - move selected units to location or attack highlighted enemy
L - spawn light fleet
M - spawn medium fleet
R - recall all fleets to the mothership
ctrl/alt + 0-9 - assign control group
0-9 - select control group

TIPS

Light ships have high attack but low health, use them to overwhelm small groups
Medium ships have high range and health and can be used to tank damage when overwhelmed
